title: Design and Application of Social Constructivist Online Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning tools (e.g., Zoom) and foundational understanding of social constructivism
context.additional_context: Designing a Collaboration-Centered Online Learning Model Considering Multicultural and Multinational Learner Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three online discussion strategies based on socioconstructivist principles
Learners successfully facilitate knowledge construction processes among peers at least twice while designing intercultural collaborative projects
Learners propose organizational online learning models applying the eight-pillar model
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
